E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 6/28/1990
Subject: I am a starter...
... so would you please put me in the rotation?
I want to go out there and start for my
team. Please come on, manager!

Regards,
Bill Gullickson



Date: Sunday, 6/29/1990
Subject: John Cangelosi healing process
John Cangelosi is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 7/14/1990
Subject: Progress of Dave Telgheder
Dear Sir,
Dave Telgheder has nothing more to prove at A Sarasota White Sox!
He has an ERA of 3.45 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 8/4/1990
Subject: Progress of Jason Grimsley
Dear Sir,
Jason Grimsley has an ERA of 3.92 at A Sarasota White Sox!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 8/28/1990
Subject: Progress of John Johnstone
Dear Sir,
John Johnstone has an ERA of 2.08 at A Sarasota White Sox!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
